Message:
I am dancing by his side
to save the world.

Because I learned that
there are many people
on this continent that
need my dance.

Of course, that doesn’t mean
I’ve given up on my dream.

I’m going to go see
my father’s hometown
in the far west.

Before I leave though,
I need to find that cat-girl.

There’s still so much
that I haven’t taught her.
